name: Scratch Shooter (Ronxlotl)
description:
DESCRIPTION OF THE GAME

This Scratch Game Does Not Harass Scratch Cat Based On The Idea. The Description of The Game Won't Give Out Any Good Detail. This Game Is A 2D Shooter That Shoots Scratch Cat But 2 Different Scratch Cats That You Were Assign To Assassinate But One Of Them Are Fast So Be Quick To Shoot Them.

GAME VERSIONS
  1. Scratch Shooter
  2. Scratch Shooter+
  3. Scratch Shooter+ (Runtime Support)
  4. Scratch Shooter+ (Controller Support)
  5. Scratch Shooter+ (Controller + Runtime Support)

Scratch Shooter+ (Gamejolt Support) Is Coming Soon But Will Only Be Available In Gamejolt Due To The Gamejolt API Only Be Available Through Gamejolt

LINKS
